      • matches

        public boolean matches(Answer other)
        Does `this` match `other`, where `this` is the candidate answer and `other` is the reference. **Not Transitive or Commutative**!

      • score

        public void score(java.lang.String name,
         double score)
        Assign a score to this answer. If you want to automatically generate models to go with this score, remember to call Score.registerAnswerScore
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the score
        score - Double value of score (or NaN)

      • scoresArray

        public double[] scoresArray(java.util.List<java.lang.String> answerScoreNames,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> passageScoreNames)
        Convenience method for returning all of the answer's scores as a primitive double[]. Intended for Weka, but it could be useful for any ML.
